title: [TNS] LOOKING FOR LOGO DESIGNER OR DESIGNER IN GENERAL
body:
Hey, we're a PLAT1 team that's on our way to challenger. We're looking for someone who can design logos and fancy shit for us.
Add dip in game. THANKS

replies.body: If you are still looking, read this article: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/GGJEZ4uf-graphics-designer-looking-for-work-clients-what-we-can-design-examples-and-website-provided
I could give it a shot, not the best at digital stuff, but can draw alright. Chuck my a email at jeshua98@gmail.com saying what your looking for and I'll give it a shot.
you need to tell em what you want so someone can make a example version for you
